Release Note:
Release Date: 20200210
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.124 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP       : 1.0.3.124 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.124 RS4RS519H1 support


ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.111 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.119 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.120 RS4RS519H1 support



+-------------------------------------------------- APO -------------------------------------------------+           
APO Version : 
                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5792 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5794 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5795 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell      : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5788 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5792 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad AMD : 12.0.6002.5794 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo AMD : 12.0.6002.5794 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.


APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5795 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.78.0B.48
        1. Fix MFX crash issue when no capture audio device.
        2. Support SAMSfppch_XXXX.dat for AMD ACP device
    - FMService 0.1.0.34
        1.  add null check for avoiding service start up crash issue on HUAWEI sku
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.78.08.41
        1. Howling issue fix
        2. Callback function issue fix
        3. v890 4mic performance update


+------------------------------------------------ SSTOem ------------------------------------------------+
SSTOEM Version with update :
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.61 RS4RS519H1 support
                 HP       : 09.21.3229.61 RS4RS519H1 support

SSTOEM Version without update :
                 Huawei   : 09.21.3229.55 RS4RS519H1 support
                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.60 RS4RS519H1 support

+------------------------------------------------ ACPOem ------------------------------------------------+
ACPOEM Version with update :
                 Lenovo : 09.21.3229.61 RS4RS519H1 support
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.61 RS4RS519H1 support

ACPOEM Version without update :

Release Note:
Release Date: 20200203
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.123 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP       : 1.0.3.123 RS4RS519H1 support


ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.111 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.119 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.122 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.120 RS4RS519H1 support



+-------------------------------------------------- APO -------------------------------------------------+           
APO Version : 
                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5792 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5794 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5792 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell      : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5788 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5792 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad AMD : 12.0.6002.5794 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo AMD : 12.0.6002.5794 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5794 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.78.0B.48
        1. Fix MFX crash issue when no capture audio device.
        2. Support SAMSfppch_XXXX.dat for AMD ACP device
    - FMService 0.1.0.32
        1. Restore of setting external mic K7 bit0 to 1 for solving HS wrong mode change (3) while 3.5mm headset plug-in.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.78.08.41
        1. Howling issue fix
        2. Callback function issue fix
        3. v890 4mic performance update


+------------------------------------------------ SSTOem ------------------------------------------------+
SSTOEM Version with update :

SSTOEM Version without update :
                 Huawei   : 09.21.3229.55 RS4RS519H1 support
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.60 RS4RS519H1 support
                 HP       : 09.21.3229.60 RS4RS519H1 support
                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.60 RS4RS519H1 support

+------------------------------------------------ ACPOem ------------------------------------------------+
ACPOEM Version with update :

ACPOEM Version without update :
                 Lenovo : 09.21.3229.59 RS4RS519H1 support
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.59 RS4RS519H1 support


+---------------------------------------------- Main Target ---------------------------------------------+
Lenovo
    //add 17AA388210EC0257 Bitland ThinkBook-14SAMD_HDAID17AA388210EC0257_array80mm_wasapi_SAMSfpa_HDAudio_DmicToHDA support NewUI/Alexa/FakeGain default mode3

Release Note:
Release Date: 20200120
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.122 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.122 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP       : 1.0.3.122 RS4RS519H1 support


ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.111 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.119 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.120 RS4RS519H1 support



+-------------------------------------------------- APO -------------------------------------------------+           
APO Version : 
                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5792 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5794 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5792 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell      : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5788 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5792 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad AMD : 12.0.6002.5794 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo AMD : 12.0.6002.5794 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5794 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.78.0B.48
        1. Fix MFX crash issue when no capture audio device.
        2. Support SAMSfppch_XXXX.dat for AMD ACP device
    - FMService 0.1.0.32
        1. Restore of setting external mic K7 bit0 to 1 for solving HS wrong mode change (3) while 3.5mm headset plug-in.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.78.08.41
        1. Howling issue fix
        2. Callback function issue fix
        3. v890 4mic performance update


+------------------------------------------------ SSTOem ------------------------------------------------+
SSTOEM Version with update :
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.60 RS4RS519H1 support
                 HP       : 09.21.3229.60 RS4RS519H1 support
                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.60 RS4RS519H1 support

SSTOEM Version without update :
                 Huawei   : 09.21.3229.55 RS4RS519H1 support

ACPOEM Version with update :

                 Lenovo : 09.21.3229.59 RS4RS519H1 support
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.59 RS4RS519H1 support

ThinkPad
    117AA507F-10EC0257-V817D_ThinkPad E14-AMD project.
    =============================================================================================
    Updated//SAMSfpa-Lenovo-50mm-17AA507F-10EC0257-V81AB_WASAPI for AMD LPAP(ThinkPad E14-AMD)_improve NS performance.dat
    =============================================================================================

    17AA5080-10EC0257-V817E_ThinkPad E15-AMD project.
    =============================================================================================
    Updated//SAMSfpa-Lenovo-50mm-17AA5080-10EC0257-V81AC_WASAPI for AMD LPAP(ThinkPad E15-AMD)_improve NS performance.dat
    =============================================================================================

    System level change request.
    =============================================================================================
    MaximumFakeVolume from 30dB(1E) change to 10dB(0A)
    DefaultFakeVolume from 20dB(14) change to 10dB(0A)
    =============================================================================================

    Alexa related setting.
    =============================================================================================
    HKLM,SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\IntelAudioService\Config\ setting copy to HKLM,SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\IntelAudioService\Parameters\
    =============================================================================================

Release Note:
Release Date: 20200113
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.121 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.121 RS4RS519H1 support

                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.111 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.119 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP       : 1.0.3.119 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.120 RS4RS519H1 support

APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5793 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.78.0B.46
        1. Support SAMSfpa_XXXX.dat for AMD ACP device
    - FMService 0.1.0.32
        1. Restore of setting external mic K7 bit0 to 1 for solving HS wrong mode change (3) while 3.5mm headset plug-in.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.78.08.41
        1. Howling issue fix
        2. Callback function issue fix
        3. v890 4mic performance update

                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.59 RS4RS519H1 support

    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.

Release Note:
Release Date: 20191230
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.

Release Note:
Release Date: 20191216
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.117 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.117 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP       : 1.0.3.117 RS4RS519H1 support

APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5791 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.78.0B.45
        1. Fix Handle numbers increased issue while recording.
    - FMService 0.1.0.31
        1. Restore of force external speak ns off (K7 0x40860004) while 3.5mm headset plug-in.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.78.08.41
        1. Howling issue fix
        2. Callback function issue fix
        3. v890 4mic performance update

Release Note:
Release Date: 20191202
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.

      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5789 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.78.0B.44
        1. Fix the noise issue while BSS enable on APO ver. 5782 ~ 5787
        2. Remove FM_ASSERT functions in core_ValidateSAMInst for Huawei.
    - FMService 0.1.0.30
        1. Remove device change event to fix UWP update performance issue
        2. Reset mic effect status pooling wait time to 500ms 
        3. HWDT is set ON when restore default action per HP require.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.78.08.41
        1. Howling issue fix
        2. Callback function issue fix
        3. v890 4mic performance update

Release Note:
Release Date: 20191125
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.113 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.113 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.113 RS4RS519H1 support

ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.111 RS4RS519H1 support

                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.111 RS4RS519H1 support

APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5787 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.78.0B.43
        1. fix unmte issue on mic & spk v2 to cover more condition
    - FMService 0.1.0.29
        1.	Set reg to notify APO for unmute cap/spk after howling elimination done.
        2.	Store howling elimination status and can notify HP UWP to show howling status.
        3.	When unmute cap/spk of howling elimination done, notify UWP howling status is out through WTC FMAPOCTL.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.78.08.41
        1. Howling issue fix
        2. Callback function issue fix
        3. v890 4mic performance update

                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.54 RS4RS519H1 support

Release Note:
Release Date: 20191118
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.

The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.

Release Note:
Release Date: 20191104
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  HP       : 1.0.3.109 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.109 RS4RS519H1 support


ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.107 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.108 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.108 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.108 RS4RS519H1 support



+-------------------------------------------------- APO -------------------------------------------------+           
APO Version : 
                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5782 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell      : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5784 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5782 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5784 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.78.0B.41
        1. Performance improvement on 4 mic smart speaker
    - FMService 0.1.0.26
        1 For USB HS, update DAT in IsSupport calling.
        2 Ext Mic NS is force to On in restore action.
        3 Only Int Spk NS reset in restore action.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.78.0B.41
        1. Performance improvement on 4 mic smart speaker


+------------------------------------------------ SSTOem ------------------------------------------------+
SSTOEM Version with update :
                 Huawei   : 09.21.3229.51 RS4RS519H1 support
                 HP       : 09.21.3229.51 RS4RS519H1 support
                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.51 RS4RS519H1 support
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.51 RS4RS519H1 support

SSTOEM Version without update :

Release Note:
Release Date: 20191028
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.108 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.108 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.108 RS4RS519H1 support

ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.105 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP       : 1.0.3.107 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.107 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support



+-------------------------------------------------- APO -------------------------------------------------+           
APO Version : 
                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5782 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell      : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5784 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5782 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5784 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.78.0B.41
        1. Performance improvement on 4 mic smart speaker
    - FMService 0.1.0.26
        1 For USB HS, update DAT in IsSupport calling.
        2 Ext Mic NS is force to On in restore action.
        3 Only Int Spk NS reset in restore action.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.78.0B.41
        1. Performance improvement on 4 mic smart speaker

                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.50 RS4RS519H1 support

======================================================================================================================================================

Release Note:
Release Date: 20191021
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.107 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP       : 1.0.3.107 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.107 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.107 RS4RS519H1 support

ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.105 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.105 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support



+-------------------------------------------------- APO -------------------------------------------------+           
APO Version : 
                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5782 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell      : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5782 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5782 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5782 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.78.08.41
        1. Howling issue fix
        2. Callback function issue fix
        3. v890 4mic performance update
    - FMService 0.1.0.26
        1 For USB HS, update DAT in IsSupport calling.
        2 Ext Mic NS is force to On in restore action.
        3 Only Int Spk NS reset in restore action.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.78.08.41
        1. Howling issue fix
        2. Callback function issue fix
        3. v890 4mic performance update


+------------------------------------------------ SSTOem ------------------------------------------------+
SSTOEM Version with update :
                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.49 RS4RS519H1 support

SSTOEM Version without update :
                 Huawei   : 09.21.3229.37 RS4RS519H1 support
                 HP       : 09.21.3229.48 RS4RS519H1 support
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.48 RS4RS519H1 support

Release Note:
Release Date: 20191014
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.

Release Note:
Release Date: 20191007
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  HP       : 1.0.3.105 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.105 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.105 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.105 RS4RS519H1 support

ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.102 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell      : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5780 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.68.06.41
        1. Performance improvement on v890
        2. Solve DOA converge issue on v860
        3. Fool-proof improvement for quick converge (Fix the issue of Cortana HWKWS and VR test at the same time)
    - FMService 0.1.0.26
        1 For USB HS, update DAT in IsSupport calling.
        2 Ext Mic NS is force to On in restore action.
        3 Only Int Spk NS reset in restore action.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.68.06.41
        1. Performance improvement on v890
        2. Solve DOA converge issue on v860
        3. Fool-proof improvement for quick converge (Fix the issue of Cortana HWKWS and VR test at the same time)

+------------------------------------------------ SSTOem ------------------------------------------------+
SSTOEM Version with update :
                 HP       : 09.21.3229.48 RS4RS519H1 support
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.48 RS4RS519H1 support

                 Huawei   : 09.21.3229.37 RS4RS519H1 support
                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.47 RS4RS519H1 support

======================================================================================================================================================

Release Note:
Release Date: 20190930
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  HP       : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.104 RS4RS519H1 support

ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.102 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.103 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.103 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support



+-------------------------------------------------- APO -------------------------------------------------+           
APO Version : 
                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell      : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5780 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.68.06.41
        1. Performance improvement on v890
        2. Solve DOA converge issue on v860
        3. Fool-proof improvement for quick converge (Fix the issue of Cortana HWKWS and VR test at the same time)
    - FMService 0.1.0.26
        1 For USB HS, update DAT in IsSupport calling.
        2 Ext Mic NS is force to On in restore action.
        3 Only Int Spk NS reset in restore action.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.68.06.41
        1. Performance improvement on v890
        2. Solve DOA converge issue on v860
        3. Fool-proof improvement for quick converge (Fix the issue of Cortana HWKWS and VR test at the same time)

+------------------------------------------------ SSTOem ------------------------------------------------+
SSTOEM Version with update :
                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.47 RS4RS519H1 support

SSTOEM Version without update :
                 Huawei   : 09.21.3229.37 RS4RS519H1 support
                 HP       : 09.21.3229.46 RS4RS519H1 support
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.46 RS4RS519H1 support

======================================================================================================================================================

Release Note:
Release Date: 20190923
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  HP       : 1.0.3.103 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.103 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.103 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.103 RS4RS519H1 support

ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell     : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.102 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.101 RS4RS519H1 support



+-------------------------------------------------- APO -------------------------------------------------+           
APO Version : 
                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Dell      : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5780 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5780 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.68.06.41
        1. Performance improvement on v890
        2. Solve DOA converge issue on v860
        3. Fool-proof improvement for quick converge (Fix the issue of Cortana HWKWS and VR test at the same time)
    - FMService 0.1.0.26
        1 For USB HS, update DAT in IsSupport calling.
        2 Ext Mic NS is force to On in restore action.
        3 Only Int Spk NS reset in restore action.
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.68.06.41
        1. Performance improvement on v890
        2. Solve DOA converge issue on v860
        3. Fool-proof improvement for quick converge (Fix the issue of Cortana HWKWS and VR test at the same time)

+------------------------------------------------ SSTOem ------------------------------------------------+
SSTOEM Version with update :

SSTOEM Version without update :
                 Huawei   : 09.21.3229.37 RS4RS519H1 support
                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.44 RS4RS519H1 support
                 HP       : 09.21.3229.46 RS4RS519H1 support
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.46 RS4RS519H1 support

======================================================================================================================================================

Release Note:
Release Date: 20190902
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  HP       : 1.0.3.99 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.99 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.99 RS4RS519H1 support

ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.87 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.93 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.95 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.95 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.97 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.98 RS4RS519H1 support


+-------------------------------------------------- APO -------------------------------------------------+           
APO Version : 
                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5779 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5776 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5778 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5776 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5773 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5773 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5778 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 86.36.0C.42
        AEC function can support to switch default render endpoint.
    - FMService 0.1.0.25
        1. fixed the risk of HP UI display (external mic)
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1.Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2.Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 80.36.0B.46
        1.Support suffix in DAT name

  12.1.6003.5779 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.68.04.41
        1. Universal FMAPO support
        1. Lid close issue fixed
        3. FL202, FL204 support issue (on v800) fixed
    - FMService 0.1.0.25
        1. Fixed the risk of HP UI display (external mic)
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.68.03.42
        1. Universal FMPCHAPO support

+------------------------------------------------ SSTOem ------------------------------------------------+
SSTOEM Version with update :
                 ThinkPad : 09.21.3229.44 RS4RS519H1 support
                 HP       : 09.21.3229.44 RS4RS519H1 support
                 Lenovo   : 09.21.3229.44 RS4RS519H1 support

SSTOEM Version without update :
                 Huawei   : 09.21.3229.37 RS4RS519H1 support

Release Note:
Release Date: 20190826
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  HP       : 1.0.3.98 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.98 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.98 RS4RS519H1 support


ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.87 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.93 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.95 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.95 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.97 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.89 RS4RS519H1 support

                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5779 RS4RS519H1 support

      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.

  12.1.6003.5778 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 86.36.0C.42
        AEC function can support to switch default render endpoint.
    - FMService 0.1.0.25
        1. fixed the risk of HP UI display (external mic)
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1.Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2.Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 80.36.0B.46
        1.Support suffix in DAT name

  12.1.6003.5779 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.68.04.41
        1. Universal FMAPO support
        1. Lid close issue fixed
        3. FL202, FL204 support issue (on v800) fixed
    - FMService 0.1.0.25
        1. Fixed the risk of HP UI display (external mic)
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.

        1. Universal FMPCHAPO support

======================================================================================================================================================

Release Note:
Release Date: 20190819
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  HP       : 1.0.3.97 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.97 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.97 RS4RS519H1 support


ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.87 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.93 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.95 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.95 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.90 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.89 RS4RS519H1 support


+-------------------------------------------------- APO -------------------------------------------------+           
APO Version : 
                  Lenovo    : 12.1.6003.5779 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad  : 12.1.6003.5776 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP        : 12.1.6003.5778 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5776 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HPAIO     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Intel     : 12.1.6003.5774 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu     : 12.1.6003.5765 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 12.0.6002.5773 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 12.0.6002.5773 RS4RS519H1 support

  # ThinkPad_KNO_RCT_WHQL : 
      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5778 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 86.36.0C.42
        AEC function can support to switch default render endpoint.
    - FMService 0.1.0.25
        1. fixed the risk of HP UI display (external mic)
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1.Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2.Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 80.36.0B.46
        1.Support suffix in DAT name

  12.1.6003.5779 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 89.68.04.41
        1. Universal FMAPO support
        1. Lid close issue fixed
        3. FL202, FL204 support issue (on v800) fixed
    - FMService 0.1.0.25
        1. Fixed the risk of HP UI display (external mic)
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1. Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2. Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 89.68.03.42
        1. Universal FMPCHAPO support

Release Note:
Release Date: 20190812
!!!! Attention !!!!
The latest WHQL driver has a little different with old version:
    The zip files are separated by different customers. (ex: Lenovo, HP, ThinkPad, etc)
    And if there has special case, it will be zipped by case. (ex: ThinkPad Rainier)
    Each zip file contains ExtOem, SSTExt (only for PCH case) and APO for each customer.
+------------------------------------------------ ExtOem ------------------------------------------------+
ExtOem Verision with update :
                  HPAIO    : 1.0.3.96 RS4RS519H1 support
                  HP       : 1.0.3.96 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Lenovo   : 1.0.3.96 RS4RS519H1 support


ExtOem Verision without update :                 
                  Intel    : 1.0.3.87 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Huawei   : 1.0.3.93 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad : 1.0.3.95 RS4RS519H1 support
                  Weibu    : 1.0.3.95 RS4RS519H1 support

                  ThinkPad Rainier : 1.0.3.90 RS4RS519H1 support
                  ThinkPad RCT/KNO : 1.0.3.89 RS4RS519H1 support

                  Huawei    : 12.1.6003.5776 RS4RS519H1 support

      special for ThinkPad KNO RCT projects.

  # ThinkPad_Rainier_WHQL :
      special for ThinkPad Rainier project
      Support USB version.



APO Description :
  12.1.6003.5776 RS4RS519H1 support
    - FMAPO64.dll 86.36.0C.42
        AEC function can support to switch default render endpoint.
    - FMService 0.1.0.24
        1.Support suffix in DAT name
        2.Support close lid decrease volume function(support from 0.1.0.21)
        3.Support Auto mode change UI
    - FM_Speech_PP64 80.16.100.137
        1.Support suffix in DAT name(Need set the DAT on system32/drivers)
        2.Check SVID to support PCH project different SSID.
    - FMPCHAPO64 80.36.0B.46
        1.Support suffix in DAT name
